docs.lead_paragraph: To reduce the chance of H.I.V. in men, health workers are pressing to make circumcisions broadly available.

headline.main: Circumcision Studied in Africa as AIDS Preventive
headline.print_headline: Circumcision Studied in Africa as AIDS Preventive

docs.snippet: To reduce the chance of H.I.V. in men, health workers are pressing to make circumcisions broadly available.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Food and Drug Administration statement denying any medical benefits of marijuana reinforced the divide between U.S. officials and the states that have approved the drug's use in certain cases.

headline.main: F.D.A.'s Report Illuminates Wide Divide on Marijuana
headline.print_headline: F.D.A.'s Report Illuminates Wide Divide on Marijuana

docs.snippet: A Food and Drug Administration statement denying any medical benefits of marijuana reinforced the divide between U.S. officials and the states that have approved the drug's use in certain cases.
